content: a comfortable cocoon shrug with a textured tunisian reverse stitch border and sleeve detail made from a single rectangle worked in **tunisian crochet** wear open as a casual cardigan or fasten with a brooch for a sophisticated garment it s simple shape allows it to suit anyone and any outfit and is really simple to make there is also a 2-colour version of this shrug tunisian cocoon shrug 2-colour version 1 *size* finished shrug measures 99cm/39 inches wide 92 5cm/36 5 inches long sleeve circumferences of 33cm/13 inches width of tunisian reverse stitch border is 6 5cm/2 5 inches *materials* 7 0mm tunisian crochet hook approximately 1380 yards of aran yarn 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tunisian-cocoon-shrug-2-colour-version
